description: This file implements the functions for managing an information repository in a system, including folder and record management, access control, and notification handling. It provides an interface for creating, deleting, opening, closing, querying, and manipulating folders and records within the repository in a platform-independent manner.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraAcqWriteAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Acquires write access to the repository by locking access control.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraRelWriteAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Releases write access to the repository by unlocking access control.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraAddSysFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName)
methods.description: Creates a system folder in the repository with default permissions and settings.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraAddFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Creates a subfolder within a specified folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraAddFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulAccessMode,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Creates a folder within a specified folder with specific permissions, type, and optional render and context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraDelFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,BOOL bRecursive)
methods.description: Deletes a folder, possibly recursively.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraDelFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,BOOL bRecursive,BOOL bForceful)
methods.description: Forcefully deletes a folder and its subfolders/records regardless of permissions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraOpenFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Opens a folder to access its contents.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraOpenFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Opens a folder with a specified access mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraCloseFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Closes a folder after operations are complete.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraClearFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Clears all contents within a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraGenerateFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Generates or updates folder content, mainly for notification.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraPopulateFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Populates folder with content, typically for initialization.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraQueryFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,PULONG pulTimestamp,PULONG pulPermission,PULONG pulFolderType,PULONG pulSubFolderCount,PULONG pulRecordCount,PULONG pulContentType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr)
methods.description: Queries metadata about a folder such as permissions, timestamps, counts.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetSubFolderCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Retrieves the number of subfolders within a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraEnumSubFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex,char * pSubFolderName,PULONG pulNameSize)
methods.description: Enumerates subfolders by index, retrieving their names.

methods.name: BOOL SysIroV2IraTestSubFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Tests if a subfolder exists and access permissions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraAddRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Adds a record to a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraAddRecord2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Adds a record with more detailed permission and render attribute options.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraDelRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Deletes a record from a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraGetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulRecordType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr,PVOID pReadBuffer,PULONG pulReadSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a record's data and metadata.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Updates or configures a record's data and attributes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraQueryRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulTimestamp,PULONG pulPermission,PULONG pulRecordType,PULONG pulRecordSize,PULONG pulContentType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr)
methods.description: Queries metadata about a specific record.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRecordCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Returns the number of records within a folder.

methods.name: SysIroV2IraGetRecordCount
methods.description: Returns the number of records in a specified folder, acquiring access before querying and releasing afterwards.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraEnumRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulNameSize,PULONG pulRecordType,PULONG pulDataSize)
methods.description: Enumerates a record by its index in a folder, retrieves metadata and copies the record name into provided buffer, with access control handling.

methods.name: BOOL SysIroV2IraTestRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Tests the existence or access permissions of a record within a folder (stub implementation in this snippet).

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetRfoUserContext(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Retrieves user-defined context property associated with a folder, with access control synchronization.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRfoUserContext(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hUserContext)
methods.description: Sets user-defined context property for a folder, with access control and debug trace.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRfoUserReserved(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Retrieves the reserved property associated with a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRfoUserReserved(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG reserved)
methods.description: Sets the reserved property for a folder, with debug trace.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRfoFolderType(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Returns the folder type, which is fixed as storage in this implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRfoFolderType(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulFolderType)
methods.description: Stub for setting folder type (not implemented).

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRfoPermission(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Returns permission mode for a folder, fixed as all access.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRfoPermission(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulPermission)
methods.description: Stub for setting folder permission (not implemented).

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetRfoRenderAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Retrieves render attributes for a folder (stub, returns NULL).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRfoRenderAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr)
methods.description: Stub for setting render attributes for a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetRroUserContext(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves user context property for a record within a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRroUserContext(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ANSC_HANDLE hUserContext)
methods.description: Sets user context property for a record within a folder, with access control.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRroUserReserved(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves reserved property for a specific record.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRroUserReserved(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG reserved)
methods.description: Sets reserved property for a specific record.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroV2IraGetRroPermission(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves permission mode for a record.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRroPermission(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulPermission)
methods.description: Stub for setting record permission.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetRroRenderAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves render attributes for a record (stub, returns NULL).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetRroRenderAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr)
methods.description: Stub for setting render attributes for a record.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetCurRecycleBin(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Stub for retrieving current recycle bin folder or property.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraAttachRecycleBin(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hRecycleBin)
methods.description: Stub for attaching a recycle bin to a folder, returns NULL.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraDetachRecycleBin(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Stub for detaching recycle bin, returns NULL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSortSubFolders(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulSortingType,BOOL bAscending)
methods.description: Sorts subfolders within a folder, implementation stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSortRecords(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulSortingType,BOOL bAscending)
methods.description: Sorts records within a folder, implementation stub.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2IraGetSysRamIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the system RAM interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2IraSetSysRamIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hInterface)
methods.description: Sets the handle to the system RAM interface.
